data.subtitle: Frontend + Backend
data.paragraph: Hey there! I'm Phyu Sin Khant Aung, a passionate full-stack web developer on a mission to bring digital ideas to life. With a solid foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies, I thrive on turning concepts into seamless, user-centric experiences.
data.paragraph_2: In additional to my love of technologies, I am also interested in cooking, playing badminton and drawing. Actually I am not a graduated developer. Back in 2021, I did research my hobby in details while we were being in quaratine situation and then my passion on developing software really became higher. I read a lot of books, articles and watch Udemy courses. I am currently working as Junior software full-stack developer in a Local Company after emphasizing my hobby.
data.paragraph_3: Below are some technologies which I am proficient over 2 years of coding experience.
